JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Motivated & energetic warehouse employees in Vejle
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Warehouse Employees Wanted in Vejle.

Are you looking for an active and hands-on job in a dynamic environment, and do you thrive in a high paced and active work?

We're hiring motivated Warehouse Employees who enjoy physical work and being part of a hardworking team!

As a Warehouse Employee, you will:

  • Pack items into boxes with care and precision.
  • Receive and process returned goods efficiently.
  • Pick and pack products from a conveyor belt.
  • Sort Items into boxes
Requirements
  • Ability to speak, read, and understand English or Danish.
  • A positive attitude and willingness to work in a team environment.
  • Enjoy physical, active work in a fast-paced setting - heavy lifting can occur.
Employment Details
  • Work Duration: 2–5 months, depending on the season.
  • Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 07:00 – 15:00.
  • Start Date: As soon as possible!
Join Us
  • Stay active while working in a friendly and supportive team.
  • Get hands-on experience in a fast-paced warehouse environment.
  • Be part of a company that values dedication and teamwork.
Next Steps

We will do interviews and facility tours during Week 3. This is your chance to meet us, see where you’ll work, and ask any questions.

Apply Now

Interested? Don’t wait! Send your application today and secure your spot on the team.

We look forward to hearing from you!
